Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a furniture product in the catalog.

category.description: Category the product belongs to (e.g., Bed, Sofa, Table).

images.description: Array of URLs pointing to product images stored in Firebase Storage.

stock.description: Number of units currently in stock.

isFeatured.description: Indicates whether the product is featured on the homepage.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was added to the catalog.

customerName.description: Name of the customer who placed the order.

items.description: Array of product IDs and quantities in the order.

status.description: Current status of the order (e.g., Pending, Processing, Delivered).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the order was placed.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application (admin or customer).

role.description: Role of the user (admin or customer).

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile data.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was first created in Firestore.

lastLoginAt.description: Timestamp of the user's last login.

NewsletterSubscriber.title: Newsletter Subscriber
NewsletterSubscriber.description: Represents a user who has subscribed to the newsletter.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user subscribed.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message sent from the contact form.

name.description: Name of the person sending the message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was sent.

isRead.description: Indicates if the message has been read by an admin.

Review.title: Review
Review.description: Represents a customer review or testimonial, stored privately for moderation.

userId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the review.

name.description: Name of the person who wrote the review.

status.description: The moderation status of the review.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the review was submitted.

PublicReview.title: Public Review
PublicReview.description: Represents a customer review that has been approved and is publicly visible.

name.description: Name of the person who wrote the review.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the review was originally submitted.

approvedAt.description: Timestamp when the review was approved by an admin.

definition.description: Stores furniture product information. Admin users can create, read, update, and delete products. All users can read products.
Stores all customer orders in a single collection. Customers can query for their own orders, while admins can access all orders.
Stores public user profile data. Created on first login. Admins can manage all users, users can only manage their own profile.
Collection to store admin user IDs. The existence of a document indicates admin role. Authorization rules check for the existence of this document to grant admin privileges.
Stores email addresses of users subscribed to the newsletter. Publicly writable for sign-ups, admin-only readable.
Stores messages submitted through the contact form. Publicly writable for submissions, admin-only for management.
Stores customer reviews for moderation. Users can create their own. Admins can read all for moderation. Users can only read their own.
Stores approved customer reviews. Publicly readable by all users. Only writable by admins.
